enchantment.minecraft.protection.desc: Reduces damage from heavy impacts like melee attacks or collisions.
enchantment.minecraft.fire_protection.de: Reduces damage from environmental dangers like fire, lightning, or harmful plants.
enchantment.minecraft.blast_protection.d: Reduces damage from supremely destructive forces such as poison, wither skulls, or explosions.
enchantment.minecraft.projectile_protect: Reduces damage from projectiles such as arrows, fireballs, and falling blocks.
enchantment.minecraft.bane_of_arthropods: Increases damage against creepy-crawly monsters like Spiders, Creepers, Slimes, and Guardians.
Increases damage against animals such as Hoglins and Polar Bears.
enchantment.enchantmentrebalance.sentine: Increases damage against humanoid monsters like Illagers, Piglins, and Endermen.
enchantment.enchantmentrebalance.precise: Increases attack speed, but prevents sweeping attacks.
enchantment.enchantmentrebalance.outstre: Increases the user's reach with this tool.
enchantment.enchantmentrebalance.collect: Collects block drops directly into the user's inventory.
enchantment.enchantmentrebalance.nocturn: See in the dark and avoid aggression from phantoms.
enchantment.enchantmentrebalance.high_cl: Lets the wearer step up full blocks.
enchantment.enchantmentrebalance.enduran: Reduces food depletion from running, jumping, swimming, and fighting.
enchantment.enchantmentrebalance.vitalit: Naturally regenerate health faster and with less food.
enchantment.enchantmentrebalance.earth_e: Consumes basic stones to preserve durability.
enchantment.enchantmentrebalance.guillot: Slain monsters may drop their heads.
enchantment.enchantmentrebalance.mattock: Breaks stone and wood as effectively as a basic pickaxe or axe.
enchantment.enchantmentrebalance.verdant: Fertilize crops at the cost of durability.
